alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Lamar; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Spalding, northwestern Monroe, south central Henry, southwestern Butts and northern Lamar Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Walker Mill, or near Griffin, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Barnesville, Locust Grove, Milner, Orchard Hill, East Griffin, Goggins, Walker Mill, McKibben, Chappel Mill, High Falls State Park, Blount, Liberty Hill, and Johnstonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
